meanings.sent1: She outdrives her friends in go-kart races.
meanings.sent2: He always outdrives his opponents in the final lap.
meanings.sent3: The little turtle outdrives the rabbit in the race!
meanings.sent4: Her determination outdrives any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The champion outdrives all others with skill and speed.

meanings.sent1: The scarecrow outdrives the crows from the cornfield.
meanings.sent2: The loud noise outdrives the birds from the trees.
meanings.sent3: The smell of fresh bread outdrives any other scent in the bakery.
meanings.sent4: His enthusiasm outdrives any doubts from his mind.
meanings.sent5: The bright light outdrives the darkness from the room.

meanings.definition: A device that transmits power from the engine to the wheels in a vehicle.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic checked the outdrives of the car for any issues.
meanings.sent2: The outdrives in the truck ensure smooth power delivery.
meanings.sent3: The outdrives in the car hum happily as they work.
meanings.sent4: The outdrives are essential for the vehicle's movement.
meanings.sent5: The outdrives efficiently transfer power for a smooth ride.
